game.name: Monster Mine Clash
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Survive waves of monsters from every direction! Aim with your mouse, defeat enemies, upgrade your weapons, and mine ores to grow stronger. Faster reflexes and smarter upgrades mean longer survival!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive waves of monsters from every direction! Aim with your mouse, defeat enemies, upgrade your weapons, and mine ores to grow stronger. Faster reflexes and smarter upgrades mean longer survival!
